nodes.title: Description
nodes.body: An authorization empowerment is a short empowerment for protector deity practice.

nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body:
• Srung ma’i bka’ gtad 
  • Las gshin bka’ gtad 
  • Ge sar skyes bu chen po'i bka' gtad dgra bla'i dar chen 
  • See also bka' srung bka' gtad
